Row.Text: +50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating the [icon:PROJECT] City-State - Incorporate Action. When you incorporate a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State, you gain all of their Units. When one of your Land Military Units defeats an enemy Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence equal to 100% of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.

[BLIST][LI][B]+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence [/B]towards initiating the [icon:PROJECT] [B]City-State - Incorporate[/B] Action.[LI]When you incorporate a [icon:CITYSTATE] [B]City-State [/B], you gain all of their Units.[LI]When one of your [B]Land Military Units [/B]defeats an enemy Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] [B]Influence [/B]equal to [B]100% [/B]of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] [B]Combat Strength[/B].[/LIST]
Gain [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when in [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.
Gain [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Gain Influence equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's Combat Strength.
Likes the Civilization with the highest[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Dislikes the one with the lowest[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence.
